label: Neutral (45 degrees)
short_description: The elbows are at a natural 45-degree angle from the torso. This is the baseline for all pressing and pulling.

label: Flared (90 degrees)
short_description: Elbows are driven out wide. Maximizes the stretch on the chest and upper back but increases torque on the shoulder joint.

label: Tucked (0-15 degrees)
short_description: Elbows are kept tight to the ribs. Shifts load to the triceps and lower lats while offering maximum shoulder protection.
